text:
Antonio Horvath (3 January 1950 – 23 May 2018) was a Chilean politician. He was born in Santiago de Chile. He served as a Deputy from 1990 to 1994, and as a Senator from 1994 to 2018. He resigned in March 2018 due to health issues.
Horvath died in Santiago on 23 May 2018 of lymphoma at the age of 68.
